mapper.select: select * from music order by id
select id from music where title=#{title}
select DISTINCT title from music where title like concat('%',concat(UPPER(#{result}),'%')) or title like concat('%',concat(LOWER(#{result}),'%'))
select DISTINCT singer from music where singer like concat('%',concat(UPPER(#{result}),'%')) or singer like concat('%',concat(LOWER(#{result}),'%'))
mapper.update: update music set videoLink=#{videoLink} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select m.id,m.title,m.singer,m.album,m.albumDate,m.photo,m.genre,m.lyrics,m.songNo,m.videoLink, ifnull((select count(l.id) from likes l where m.id=l.musicId group by musicId),0) likesCount from music m;
